## PostHogPluginOptions

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/analytics/src/posthog/plugin.ts" sourceLine="8" packageName="@commandkit/analytics" />

Options for the PostHog plugin.

```ts title="Signature"
interface PostHogPluginOptions {
    posthogOptions: {
    /**
     * The PostHog API key.
     */
    apiKey: string;
    /**
     * Additional options for the PostHog client.
     */
    options?: PostHogOptions;
  };
}
```
